div.p: The kind of operation to perform as part of a property based filter
This value set defines it's own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/filter-operator

tr.td: The property value has the concept specified by the value
The property value has a concept that has an is_a relationship with the value
The property value has a concept that does not have an is_a relationship with the value
The property value representation matches the regex specified in the value

description.value: The kind of operation to perform as part of a property based filter

definition.value: The property value has the concept specified by the value
The property value has a concept that has an is_a relationship with the value
The property value has a concept that does not have an is_a relationship with the value
The property value representation matches the regex specified in the value
